nodes.id: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡事件

zh-cn: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡事件
en: Pucheng County Vocational Education Center Student Death Incident

description.zh-cn: 2025年1月2日，陕西省渭南市蒲城县职业教育中心学生党某从学校宿舍坠楼身亡的事件。
description.en: An incident on January 2, 2025, where a student surnamed Dang died after falling from a school dormitory at the Pucheng County Vocational Education Center in Weinan, Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生，于2025年1月2日从学校宿舍坠楼身亡。
description.en: A student at Pucheng County Vocational Education Center who died after falling from a school dormitory on January 2, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 蒲城县职业教育中心一年级学生，事发前曾与党某发生冲突。
description.en: A first-year student at Pucheng County Vocational Education Center who had a conflict with Dang before the incident.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省渭南市蒲城县的一所中等职业学校，是学生坠亡事件的发生地。
description.en: A secondary vocational school in Pucheng County, Weinan City, Shaanxi Province, where the student's death occurred.

description.zh-cn: 负责调查蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡事件的官方机构。
description.en: The official body responsible for investigating the student's death at Pucheng County Vocational Education Center.

nodes.id: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

zh-cn: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动
en: Protests following the Pucheng County Vocational Education Center student's death

description.zh-cn: 因党某坠亡事件及校方处理方式引发的，由死者家属和当地民众参与的大规模示威抗议活动。
description.en: A large-scale demonstration and protest involving the deceased's family and local residents, triggered by the death of Dang and the school's handling of the matter.

description.zh-cn: 党某的母亲，对校方处理方式提出质疑，后又呼吁民众停止聚集。
description.en: The mother of Dang, who questioned the school's handling of the incident and later called on the public to stop gathering.

description.zh-cn: 被指为蒲城县职业教育中心副校长，在抗议活动中遭到示威者围殴。
description.en: Alleged to be the vice principal of Pucheng County Vocational Education Center, who was beaten by protesters during the demonstrations.

description.zh-cn: 在蒲城县的抗议活动中维持秩序并与示威者发生冲突的执法力量。
description.en: Law enforcement forces that maintained order and clashed with protesters during the protests in Pucheng County.

description.zh-cn: 党某的舅舅，在抗议活动中被警方带走。
description.en: The maternal uncle of Dang, who was taken away by the police during the protest.

en: Propaganda Department of the Pucheng County Committee

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国共产党在蒲城县的宣传机构，就抗议事件向媒体发布信息。
description.en: The propaganda agency of the Communist Party of China in Pucheng County, which released information to the media about the protest.

description.zh-cn: 报道了蒲城县学生坠亡及抗议事件的香港报纸。
description.en: A Hong Kong newspaper that reported on the student's death and subsequent protests in Pucheng County.

description.zh-cn: 报道了蒲城县抗议事件平息后情况的广播电台。
description.en: A radio station that reported on the situation in Pucheng County after the protests subsided.

description.zh-cn: 蒲城县职业教育中心政教处副主任，曾调解党某与郭某的冲突。
description.en: Deputy director of the Political and Educational Department of Pucheng County Vocational Education Center, who mediated the conflict between Dang and Guo.

relationships.source: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡事件

description.zh-cn: 党某在该事件中从学校宿舍坠楼身亡。
description.en: Dang died in this incident after falling from a school dormitory.

description.zh-cn: 党某是蒲城县职业教育中心的学生。
description.en: Dang was a student at Pucheng County Vocational Education Center.

description.zh-cn: 党某与郭某在事发前一晚因郭某聊天影响休息而发生口角和肢体冲突。
description.en: On the night before the incident, Dang had a verbal and physical conflict with Guo because Guo's chatting disturbed his rest.

description.zh-cn: 郭某与党某在事发前一晚因聊天影响党某休息而发生口角和肢体冲突。
description.en: On the night before the incident, Guo had a verbal and physical conflict with Dang because his chatting disturbed Dang's rest.

description.zh-cn: 据死者亲属称，学校在她到校后将其看管，并阻止她对死者遗体拍照。
description.en: According to the deceased's relatives, the school placed his mother under supervision after she arrived and prevented her from taking photos of the body.

relationships.target: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡事件

description.zh-cn: 发布通报，经调查认定该生系高空坠落死亡，排除刑事案件。
description.en: Issued a notification stating that after investigation, it was determined that the student died from a high-altitude fall, and a criminal case was ruled out.

relationships.source: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡事件
relationships.target: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

description.zh-cn: 学生坠亡事件以及家属对校方隐瞒真相的怀疑，引发了大规模的民众抗议。
description.en: The student's death and the family's suspicion of a cover-up by the school triggered large-scale public protests.

description.zh-cn: 在抗议活动中将死者的舅舅带走，引发事态升级。
description.en: Took away the deceased's maternal uncle during the protest, causing the situation to escalate.

relationships.source: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

description.zh-cn: 示威者与防暴警察爆发冲突，造成多人受伤流血。
description.en: Protesters clashed with riot police, resulting in multiple injuries and bloodshed.

relationships.source: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

description.zh-cn: 示威者推倒学校铁闸并闯入校园，对办公室、食堂等设施进行破坏。
description.en: Protesters broke down the school's iron gate, stormed the campus, and vandalized facilities such as offices and the canteen.

relationships.source: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

description.zh-cn: 被指是蒲城职中副校长的张文平遭到示威者围殴。
description.en: Zhang Wenping, alleged to be the vice principal of the Pucheng vocational school, was beaten by protesters.

relationships.target: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

description.zh-cn: 发布视频，呼吁民众“不要相信谣言去学校聚集”。
description.en: Released a video calling on the public 'not to believe rumors and gather at the school'.

relationships.target: 蒲城县职业教育中心学生坠亡引发的抗议活动

description.zh-cn: 向媒体表示抗议已得到控制，人群已被驱散。
description.en: Informed the media that the protest had been brought under control and the crowd had been dispersed.

description.zh-cn: 被指是蒲城县职业教育中心的副校长。
description.en: Alleged to be the vice principal of Pucheng County Vocational Education Center.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Political and Educational Department

description.zh-cn: 雷某在蒲城县职业教育中心担任政教处副主任。
description.en: Lei served as the Deputy Director of the Political and Educational Department at Pucheng County Vocational Education Center.

description.zh-cn: 在值班室对党某和郭某之间的冲突进行调解。
description.en: Mediated the conflict between Dang and Guo in the duty room.
